#A draft of the XML document emitted by ThreadSanitizer with the appropriate flags.

= Relevant flags =

|| Flag                   || Default value  || Comment                                   ||
|| `--xml=<yes|no>`       ||   `no`         || turns on the XML facility                 ||
|| `--xml-fd=<number>`    || `-1 (disabled)` || send XML output to `fd`, need `xml=yes`  ||
|| `--xml-file=<file>`    ||                || send XML output to a file, need `xml=yes` ||
|| `--xml-socket=<ip:port>` ||              || send XML output to a socket               ||
|| `--xml-user-comment=<str>` ||            || Embed an extra user comment string at the start of the XML output ||

= XML tags in Memcheck =
== Emitted by Coregrind ==
|| Tag               || Emitted by || Comment ||
|| `<arg>`   || coregrind || ||
|| `<args>`    || coregrind || ||

|| `<exe>` || coregrind || Executable name, inside `<argv>` ||
|| `<logfilequalifier>` || coregrind || ||
|| `<pid>` || coregrind || PID, inside `<valgrindoutput>` ||
|| `<ppid>` || coregrind || PPID `<valgrindoutput>` ||
|| `<preamble>` || coregrind || ||
|| `<protocoltool>` || coregrind || Name of tool (e.g. memcheck) ||
|| `<protocolversion>` || coregrind || Inside `<valgrindoutput>` ||
|| `<usercomment>` || coregrind || XML comment ||
|| `<valgrindoutput>` || coregrind || Top XML tag ||
